
```{r}
metadata = read.csv("tests/testdata/G798_Metadata.csv")
compound_info = read.csv("tests/testdata/G798_Compound_info.csv")

tidy_data = read.csv("tests/testdata/G798_tidy_data.csv")
metadata = read.csv("tests/testdata/G798_Metadata.csv")

phgrobiome_output = phgrobiome(tidy_data,metadata)

compound_info = read.csv("tests/testdata/G798_Compound_info.csv")

annotated_data = meta_combine(phgrobiome_output, metadata = metadata,compound_info = compound_info)
cols_with_color_label = c("Community","Compound")
```
